languages.text: "Но поскольку судьба одарила нас столь почетными гостями, я охотно уступаю право покарать нечестивцев вам, Звездное Сиятельство". {n}Несмотря на патоку слов, голос палача выдает плохо скрываемое неудовольствие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Но поскольку судьба облагодетельствовала нас столь почетными гостями, я с готовностью уступаю право покарать нечестивцев вам, Звездное Сиятельство". {n}Несмотря на патоку слов, голос палача выдает плохо скрываемое неудовольствие.{/n}

languages.text: "But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но поскольку судьба одарила нас столь почетными гостями, я охотно уступаю право покарать нечестивцев вам, Звездное Сиятельство". {n}Несмотря на патоку слов, голос палача выдает плохо скрываемое неудовольствие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly forfeit the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

"But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly forfeit the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

"But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

"But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

"But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

"But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

languages.text: "Aber nachdem uns das Schicksal so erlesene Gäste beschert hat, überlasse ich die Bestrafung dieses Gesindels mit Freuden Euch, Eure himmlische Hoheit." {n}Trotz seiner honigsüßen Worte erkennst du in der Stimme des Henkers seine schlecht kaschierte Enttäuschung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber nachdem uns das Schicksal so erlesene Gäste beschert hat, überlasse ich die Bestrafung dieses Gesindels mit Freuden Euch, Eure himmlische Hoheit." {n}Trotz seiner honigsüßen Worte erkennst du in der Stimme des Henkers seine schlecht kaschierte Enttäuschung.{/n}

languages.text: « Mais puisque le destin nous a envoyé des visiteurs aussi prestigieux, c'est avec grand plaisir que je vous cède le droit de punir ces scélérats, Votre Altesse Célestissime. » {n}Malgré ses paroles mielleuses, le bourreau ne parvient pas à cacher le mécontentement dans sa voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais puisque le destin nous a envoyé des visiteurs aussi prestigieux, c'est avec grand plaisir que je vous cède le droit de punir ces scélérats, Votre Altesse Célestissime. » {n}Malgré ses paroles mielleuses, le bourreau ne parvient pas à cacher le mécontentement dans sa voix.{/n}

languages.text: “不过，既然命运将如此尊贵的客人带到了我们面前，我已经迫不及待想把惩罚恶人的权利交给您了，来自上界的大人。”{n}尽管刽子手说出的话充满恭维之意，但他的语调却暴露了难以掩饰的不快。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不过，既然命运将如此尊贵的客人带到了我们面前，我已经迫不及待想把惩罚恶人的权利交给您了，来自上界的大人。”{n}尽管刽子手说出的话充满恭维之意，但他的语调却暴露了难以掩饰的不快。{/n}

languages.text: «Pero, ya que el destino nos otorga una visita tan excelsa, le cedo gustoso el derecho a castigar a estos criminales, Excelencia Celestial». {n}Las melosas palabras del verdugo no bastan para ocultar el desagrado de su voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero, ya que el destino nos otorga una visita tan excelsa, le cedo gustoso el derecho a castigar a estos criminales, Excelencia Celestial». {n}Las melosas palabras del verdugo no bastan para ocultar el desagrado de su voz.{/n}

languages.text: 「しかし、運命がこのような高貴な来訪者を私たちに授けてくださった以上、この悪人たちを罰する権利は、天の閣下であるあなたにお譲りいたします」{n}甘い言葉とは裏腹に、処刑人の声には隠しきれない不快感がにじんでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、運命がこのような高貴な来訪者を私たちに授けてくださった以上、この悪人たちを罰する権利は、天の閣下であるあなたにお譲りいたします」{n}甘い言葉とは裏腹に、処刑人の声には隠しきれない不快感がにじんでいた。{/n}

languages.text: "Kader bizi böylesine yüce misafirlerle onurlandırdığı için bu kötü niyetli kimseleri cezalandırma hakkını size devrediyorum Semavi Efendimiz." {n}Celladın sesi, tatlı sözlerinin aksine pek de iyi gizleyemediği hoşnutsuzluğunu ele veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But, since fate has graced us with such lofty visitors, I eagerly cede the right to punish these miscreants to you, Your Celestial Highness." {n}Contrary to his honeyed words, the executioner's voice betrays his poorly concealed displeasure.{/n}
